album.title: The Boy Who Knew Too Much

track.name: Touches You
comments: Yeah this song is slightly disturbing.
Reminiscent of Father Figure by George Michael. Love it! ♥ [2] I was about to post this same comment TT lol
Reminiscent of Father Figure by George Michael. Love it! ♥
hahaha this song is soooooo freaking disturbing! i wanna be your mother whatever else that touches you O.O wtf?! but i love me some mika<3
i wanna be whatever else that touches you ♥
should be a single!
Such a feel good song!! ^_^

Oh, btw, by reading the comments,  I never noted that this song it's a little George Michael's stuff  (which I have no problem with)  But it's  funny  because of that Freddy Mercury thing with Mika's voice, considering that George Michael interpretation of "Somebody To Love" it's  the greatest Queen cover ever made. Maybe them both should be leading Queen instead of Paul Rodgers XDD

This is, by far, one of the top three songs that  I listened to on 2010  o.O :D
It's addictive <3
This isn't George Michael? Good stuff nonetheless
